title: Enhancing Microbial Biosynthetic Resistance: Short-Intensive Course Based on Evolutionary Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic life sciences and microbiology concepts
context.additional_context: Job-linked education for working adults, involving smartphone-based learning content and weekly project assignments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for enhancing microbial resistance using an evolutionary approach.
Learners can analyze toxic mechanisms in the carboxylic acid production process and propose improvement measures.
Learners can evaluate the correlation between microbial membrane structure changes and biosynthetic efficiency through real-world case-based projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
